description: Manage Azure NetApp Files (ANF) Subvolume Metadata.

commands.name: az netappfiles subvolume metadata show
commands.summary: Get details of the specified subvolume.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles subvolume metadata show [--account-name]
                                       [--ids]
                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                       [--pool-name]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--subscription]
                                       [--subvolume-name]
                                       [--volume-name]
examples: az netappfiles subvolume metadata show -g mygroup --account-name myaccountname  --pool-name mypoolname --volume-name myvolumename --subvolume-name mysubvolumename
